# AUDIO::USE_SIREN_AS_HORN

## Summary
SirenAsHorn -> true will use a more sireny horn if the vehicle has got a siren, false will use a normal horn

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** sirenAsHorn
